GR14bhrgus_u:8429: siddhā jānanti śāstrārthān siddhā jānanti cāgamān /
GR14bhrgus_u:8432: rājā taṃ tu vicāryaiva punarvaikhānasaiḥkramāt // BhS_34.53 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8435: atha paurāṇiko deśaḥ kathyate yatra yatra vai /
GR14bhrgus_u:8440: bhavantyatha kalau prāpte lupyante tānyanekaśaḥ // BhS_34.57 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8442: punāti deśaḥ paurāṇastatra kiṃ cinna hīyate // BhS_34.58 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8449: na hi paurāṇike deśe yajamānasya gauravam /
GR14bhrgus_u:8450: arthasya gauravaṃ cāpi darśanīyaṃ mahātmabhiḥ? // BhS_34.62 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8455: mānuṣaṃ pañcamaṃ proktaṃ sthalaṃ yatra viśeṣataḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:8456: grāme vā nagare vāpi śāstrokte sumanorame // BhS_34.65 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8462: manuṣyāḥ puṇyakarmāṇastatra tatra dine dine // BhS_34.68 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8474: yatra vā dṛśyate bhedo bhagavacchāstraśilpayoḥ // BhS_34.74 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8486: gṛhaṃ ca cititulyaṃ syādyatra nārādhyate hariḥ // BhS_34.80 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8488: bhuṅkte sa yāti narakān sūkareṣvasi jāyate // BhS_34.81 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8490: tasyānnaṃ naiva bhoktavyamabhakṣyeṇa samaṃ hi tat // BhS_34.82 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8496: yathā ca parame vyomni sannidhatte tathā hariḥ // BhS_34.85 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8498: sādhyā vidyādharā yakṣāssarvā vai devayonayaḥ // BhS_34.86 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8500: vāyurvāti sukhaṃ tatra sūryastapati tejasā // BhS_34.87 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8502: bhūmissasyavatī ca syātprasannaṃ ca nabho bhavet // BhS_34.88 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8505: na vyādhijaṃ bhayaṃ kiṃ cinnāpi jvarakṛtaṃ tathā /
GR14bhrgus_u:8506: na vyālajaṃ bhayaṃ vāpi bhavedatrana saṃśayaḥ // BhS_34.90 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8507: nopaplavo nṛpāṇāṃ vā mṛgāṇāṃ vāpyapāṃ bhavet /
GR14bhrgus_u:8510: āgnihotrāśca hūyante tapyante 'tra tapāṃsi ca // BhS_34.92 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8513: prākṛtaṃ yo vadenmūḍhassa yāti narakaṃ dhruvam /
GR14bhrgus_u:8521: svarṇasteye ca yatpāpaṃ surāpāne ca yadbhavet /
GR14bhrgus_u:8526: tasmin deśe viśeṣeṇa sarvebhāgavatā harau // BhS_34.100 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8528: na hi sarvo 'pi sarvatra svayaṃvyaktasthalādikam // BhS_34.101 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8534: tasmādaprākṛtaṃ deśaṃ na brūyātprākṛtaṃ naraḥ // BhS_34.104 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8535: na ca sāmānyabhāvena taṃ paśyedyadi paśyati /
GR14bhrgus_u:8536: naśyatyeva na saṃdeha iti śāstraviniścayaḥ // BhS_34.105 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8537: iti śrīvaikhānase bhagavacchāstre bhṛguproktāyāṃ sahitāyāṃ prakīrṇādhikāre catustriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ.
GR14bhrgus_u:8546: kulānāṃ śatamāgāmi samatītaṃ tathā śatam // BhS_35.3 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8548: saptajanmakṛtaṃ pāpamalpaṃ vā yadi vā bahu // BhS_35.4 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8552: praśastadeśe bhūbhāge yo naro bhavanaṃ hareḥ // BhS_35.6 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8556: pratimāṃ lakṣaṇavatīṃ yaḥ kārayati mānavaḥ // BhS_35.8 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8558: ṣaṣṭiṃ varṣasahasrāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi sa mogate // BhS_35.9 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8560: tataḥ prayāti vaikuṇṭhaṃ nissamābhyadhikaṃ mahaḥ // BhS_35.10 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8562: puruṣaḥ kṛtakṛtyatvānnainaṃ śvo maraṇaṃ tapet // BhS_35.11 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8563: ye bhaviṣyanti ye 'tītā ākalpāḥ puruṣāḥ kule /
GR14bhrgus_u:8564: tāṃstārayati saṃsthāpya devasya pratiyāṃ hareḥ // BhS_35.12 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8570: nājñābhaṅgaṃ kariṣyanti bhavatāṃ jantavaḥ kvacit // BhS_35.15 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8574: pūjayanti sadā viṣṇuṃ te vastyājyāḥ sudūrataḥ // BhS_35.17 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8575: yastiṣṭhan yassvapan bhuñjan uttiṣṭhan skhaliteṣu ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:8578: nāvalokyā bhavadbhiste tattejo hanti vau gatim // BhS_35.19 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8580: arcayanti na te grāhyānarāḥ kṛṣṇāśrayoddhatāḥ // BhS_35.20 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8592: yaṃ yaṃ kāmayate kāmaṃ taṃ tamāpnotyasaṃśayam // BhS_35.26 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8595: karoti kṣudhitānāṃ ca bhojyāṃ pākakriyāṃ śikhī /
GR14bhrgus_u:8602: ahanyahani yatpāpaṃ kurute viṣayī naraḥ // BhS_35.31 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8604: sabāhyābhyantaraṃ tasya kāyo niṣkalmaṣo bhavet // BhS_35.32 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8608: udakābhyukṣaṇaṃ viṣṇoryaḥ karoti satā gṛhe // BhS_35.34 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8620: tasya puṇyaphalaṃ vaktuṃ nālaṃ devāssahānugāḥ // BhS_35.40 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8624: tasminvimāne sa narastsrī vā tiṣṭhati śobhane // BhS_35.42 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8627: liptā ca yāvatā hastā viṣṇorāyatane mahī /
GR14bhrgus_u:8631: tat kṣayādiha cāgatya viśiṣṭe jāyate kule /
GR14bhrgus_u:8640: na tasyajāyate bhaṅgo gārhasthye tu kadā ca na // BhS_35.50 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8642: nāpnoti sāpi vaidhavyaṃ gṛhabhaṅgaṃ kadā ca na // BhS_35.51 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8648: so 'pi lokaṃ samāsādya modatevai śatakratoḥ // BhS_35.54 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8650: upalipte naro datvā na durgatimavāpnuyāt // BhS_35.55 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8660: tān lokān puruṣā yāntikṣīrasnānakarā hareḥ // BhS_35.60 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8665: yathā ca vimalaṃ kṣīraṃ yathā nirvṛtikārakam /
GR14bhrgus_u:8670: yassnāpayati devasya ghṛtena pratimāṃ hareḥ // BhS_35.65 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8671: indraprasthe dvijāgṣāṇāṃ sa dadāti gavāṃ śatam /
GR14bhrgus_u:8672: gavāṃ śatasya viprāṇāṃ na dattasya bhavetphalam // BhS_35.66 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8674: purā rājarṣibhiḥ prāptā saptadvīpā vasundharā // BhS_35.67 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8676: pratimāsaṃ sitāṣṭamyāṃ ghṛtena jagataḥ patim // BhS_35.68 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8678: dvādaśyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ ca gavyena haviṣā hareḥ // BhS_35.69 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8680: jñānato 'jñānato vāpi yatpāpaṃ kurute naraḥ // BhS_35.70 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8683: sa gatvāvaiṣṇavaṃ dhāma modate saha sūribhiḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:8684: srajaṃ baddhvā sumanasāṃ yaḥ prayacchati viṣṇave // BhS_35.72 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8692: upānahau pāduke ca vāhanaṃ yānameva ca // BhS_35.76 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8694: sa vimānaṃ tu dutprāpaṃ prāpno tyeva na saṃśayaḥ // BhS_35.77 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8697: sāmīpyaṃ sahasā viṣṇoryāti sadyo sa saṃśayaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:8698: dhvajaṃ ca vādyamutpādya viṣṇusātkurute tu yaḥ // BhS_35.79 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8700: dāsīdāsaṃ tathātmāna mātmīyaṃ ca prayacchali // BhS_35.80 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8706: dīpaṃ prayacchati naro viṣṇorāyatane hi yaḥ // BhS_35.83 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8712: jātismaratvaṃ prajñāṃ ca prākāśyaṃ sarvavantuṣu // BhS_35.86 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8714: sarvakālaṃ ca cakṣuṣmān medhāvī dīpado naraḥ // BhS_35.87 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8715: jāyate narakaṃ cāpi tamassaṃjñaṃ na paśyati /
GR14bhrgus_u:8720: kurvīta dīpahartāca mūkū'ndho jāyate jaḍaḥ // BhS_35.90 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8726: idānīṃ yātanā bhaugāḥkiṃ vilāpaḥ kariṣyati // BhS_35.93 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8728: etatkona vijānāti yena yūyaṃ pramādinaḥ // BhS_35.94 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8736: na vo vilapite kiṃ cididānīṃ dṛśyate phalam // BhS_35.98 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8743: yadbhūyo 'pi matiḥ pāpe na kartavyā kathaṃ ca na /
GR14bhrgus_u:8748: haviṣāṃ pāyasādīnāṃ haraye ca nivedanāt // BhS_35.104 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8763: taṭākānāṃ ca vakṣyāmi kṛtānāṃ cāpi ye guṇāḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:8764: triṣu lokeṣu sarvatra pūjanīyaḥ pratāpavān // BhS_35.112 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8770: taṭākāni ca sarvāṇi diśanti śriyamuttamām // BhS_35.115 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8772: sthāvarāṇi ca bhūtāni saṃśrayanti jalāśayam // BhS_35.116 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8775: varṣākāle taṭāke tu salilaṃ yasya tiṣṭhati /
GR14bhrgus_u:8777: śaratkā le tu salilaṃ taṭāke yasya tiṣṭhati /
GR14bhrgus_u:8780: sa vai bahusuvarṇasya yajñasya labhate phalam // BhS_35.120 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8781: yasya vai śaiśire kāle taṭāke salilaṃ bhavet /
GR14bhrgus_u:8784: atirātrasya yajñasya phalaṃ sa samupāśnute // BhS_35.122 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8786: vājimedhapalaṃ tasya phalaṃ vai munayo viduḥ // BhS_35.123 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8787: sa kulaṃ tārayetsarvaṃ yasya khāte jalāśaye /
GR14bhrgus_u:8788: gāvaḥ pibanti salilaṃ sādhavaśca narāssadā // BhS_35.124 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8789: taṭāke yasya gāvastu pibanti tṛṣitā jalam /
GR14bhrgus_u:8793: durlabhaṃ salilaṃ ceha viśeṣeṇa paratra vai /
GR14bhrgus_u:8796: tasya puṇyaphalaṃ vaktuṃ nālaṃ devāssahānu gāḥ // BhS_35.128 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8798: snātvā kurvanti karmāṇi tasya nākesthitirbhavet // BhS_35.129 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8800: tasya lokā bhavantyeva pāvanāḥ kṣativarjitāḥ // BhS_35.130 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8804: sthānarāṇāṃ ca bhūtānāṃ jātayaṣṣaṭ prakīrtitāḥ // BhS_35.132 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8806: etā jātyastu vṛkṣāṇāṃ teṣāṃ rope guṇāstvime // BhS_35.133 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8807: kīrtiśca mānave loke pretya caiva phalaṃ śubham /
GR14bhrgus_u:8808: labhate nāma loke ca pitṛbhiśca mahīyate // BhS_35.134 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8812: tasya putrā bhavantyete pādapā nātra saṃśayaḥ // BhS_35.136 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8814: puṣpaissuragaṇān vṛkṣāḥ phalaiścāpi tathā pitṛn // BhS_35.137 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8820: patraṃ phalaṃ vā puṣpaṃ vā yasyārāme 'varopite // BhS_35.140 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8822: patraiḥphalair vāpuṣpairvā prīyate bhagavān hariḥ // BhS_35.141 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8826: ete svarge mahīyante ye cānye satyavādinaḥ // BhS_35.143 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8828: yajecca vividhairyajñaissatyaṃ ca satataṃ vadet // BhS_35.144 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8832: acalā hyakṣayo bhūmissarvān kāmān prayacchati // BhS_35.146 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8834: tasyaihikaṃ bhavetpuṇyaṃ tathā pāratrikaṃ bahu // BhS_35.147 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8839: brahmārpaṇadhiyā yastu guptaṃ dāsyati kiṃ cana /
GR14bhrgus_u:8842: yaṃ yaṃ kāmaṃ tu manasi kṛtvā yadyacca yor'payet // BhS_35.151 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8848: sarvameva bhaveddattaṃ vasudhāṃ yaḥ prayacchati // BhS_35.154 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8856: sa śatānyeva gokarṇamiti vedavido vidaḥ // BhS_35.158 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8860: evaṃ bhūmikṛtaṃ dānaṃ sasye sasye prarohati // BhS_35.160 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8864: evaṃ dattāciraṃ kālaṃ bhūmirbharati bhūmidam // BhS_35.162 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8866: yo dadāti naraśreṣṭhassa na pracyavate divaḥ // BhS_35.163 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8872: gandharvāpsaraso yatra tatra tiṣṭhanti bhūmidāḥ // BhS_35.166 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8875: yasya yasya yadā bhūmi stasya tasya tadā phalam /
GR14bhrgus_u:8876: bhūmiṃ yaḥ pratigṛhṇāti yaśca bhūmiṃ prayacchati // BhS_35.168 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8882: punaśca janma saṃpāpya bhavedbhūmi patirdhruvam // BhS_35.171 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8883: yathā bhūmissadā devī dātāraṃ kurute patim /
GR14bhrgus_u:8886: mahīṃ dadatpavitrassyātpuṇyā ca jagatī yataḥ // BhS_35.173 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8893: yathā janitrī kṣīreṇa puṣṇāti svasutaṃ mudā /
GR14bhrgus_u:8896: na tatphalamavāpnoti yaddatvā vasudhāṃ punaḥ // BhS_35.178 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8898: ghorāśca vāruṇāḥ pāśā nopasarpanti bhūmidam // BhS_35.179 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8901: ādityā iva dīpyante tejasā di mānavāḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:8902: ye prayacchanti vasudhāṃ haraye lokasākṣiṇe // BhS_35.181 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8907: sa naḥ kulasya puruṣassano bandhussano guruḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:8908: sa dātā sa ca vikrānto yo dadāti vasuṃdharām // BhS_35.184 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8912: dhenuṃ datvā suvratāṃ ca sopadhānāṃ payasvinīm // BhS_35.186 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8914: devadevasya tuṣṭyarthaṃ devāya brāhmaṇāya vā // BhS_35.187 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8915: na tasya śakyate vaktuṃ phalaṃ varṣaśatairapi /
GR14bhrgus_u:8917: tāvadvarṣa sahasrāṇi kāmān duhyeta sā varā /
GR14bhrgus_u:8920: sā gauḥ kāmadughā bhūtvā dātāramupasarpati // BhS_35.190 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8922: parāṃ vṛddhiṃśriyaṃ prāpya svargaloke mahīyate // BhS_35.191 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8924: gacchetsukṛtināṃ lokān gāvo datvā yathāvidhi // BhS_35.192 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8926: tasyāpi cākṣayā lokā bhavantīha paratra ca // BhS_35.193 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8927: yo vā dyūte dhanaṃ jitvāgāvaḥkrītvā prayacchati /
GR14bhrgus_u:8930: sa gatvā durlabhaṃ sthānamamaraissaha modate // BhS_35.195 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8932: sa gatvā virajān lokān sukhaṃ vasati devavat // BhS_35.196 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8936: tamaḥ praviśate datvā dvijaṃ kleśena yojayet // BhS_35.198 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8938: yuñjyātlkeśaistu yo vipraṃ datvaināṃ tadvṛdhā bhavet // BhS_35.199 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8939: yuvānaṃ balinaṃ śyāmaṃ halena saha yūthapam /
GR14bhrgus_u:8941: brāhmaṇānāṃ gavāṃ caiva kulamekaṃ dvidhā kṛtam /
GR14bhrgus_u:8942: ekatra mantrā stiṣṭhanti havirekatra tiṣṭhati // BhS_35.201 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8950: tulyaprabhāvā devaiste modante psarasāṃ gaṇaiḥ // BhS_35.205 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8954: yathaiva salile matsyassalilena sahoṣya te // BhS_35.207 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8958: tānu dattāsu loke 'smin kiṃ na dattaṃ bhavediha // BhS_35.209 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8961: suvarṇaṃ paramaṃ dānaṃ suvarṇaṃ dakṣiṇā parā /
GR14bhrgus_u:8964: apipāpaśataṃ kṛtvā dattaṃ vipriṣu tārayet // BhS_35.212 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8969: agnyabhāve ca kurvanti vahnisthāne ca kāñcanam /
GR14bhrgus_u:8981: na hyataḥ paramaṃ loke sadyaḥ pāpavināśanam /
GR14bhrgus_u:8982: brahmakośasya śuddhasya suvarṇaṃ yaḥ prayacchati // BhS_35.221 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8984: iti saṃkṣepataḥ proktaṃ svarṇadānaphalaṃ mayā // BhS_35.222 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8986: viṣṇave ca śriyai bhūmyai sarvadevebhya eva ca // BhS_35.223 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8988: na śakyate phalaṃ tasya vaktuṃ varṣaśatairapi // BhS_35.224 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8994: lokatantraṃ hi saṃjñāśca sarvamanne pratiṣṭhitam // BhS_35.227 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8995: annena sadṛśaṃ dānaṃ na bhūto na bhaviṣyati /
GR14bhrgus_u:8998: annena dhāryate sarvaṃ viśvaṃ jagadidaṃ mahat // BhS_35.229 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9000: annādbhavanti vai prāṇāḥ pratyakṣaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ // BhS_35.230 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9008: annadaḥ prāpnute bhū yo bhuvi ceha ca yatsukham // BhS_35.234 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9010: api śvapāke śuni vā na dānaṃ vipraṇaśyati // BhS_35.235 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9016: brāhmaṇāya viśeṣeṇa na sa pāpena muhyate // BhS_35.238 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9018: annadāmapi śūdre ca brāhmaṇasya viśiṣyate // BhS_35.239 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9024: asmākamapi putro vā pautro vānnaṃ pradāsyati // BhS_35.242 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9026: akāmovā sakāmo vā datvā puṇyamavāpnuyāt // BhS_35.243 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9028: viprā yamadhigacchanti bhikṣamāṇā gṛhaṃ sadā // BhS_35.244 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9030: mahābhoge kule pretya janma cāpnoti nityaśaḥ // BhS_35.245 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9032: nityaṃ mṛṣṭānnadāyī tu svarge vasati satkṛtaḥ // BhS_35.246 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9034: annadaḥ paśumān putrī dhanavān bhogavānapi // BhS_35.247 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9036: annadaḥprāṇado loke sarvadaḥ procyate tu saḥ // BhS_35.248 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9040: upyate yatra tadbījaṃ taddhi puṇyaphalaṃ mahat // BhS_35.250 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9046: annaṃ bhuvaṃ divaṃ khaṃ ca sarvamanne pratiṣṭhitam // BhS_35.253 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9047: anna praṇāśe bhidyante śarīre pañca dhātavaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9050: nivartante viśeṣeṇa brahma cātra pradīyate // BhS_35.255 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9052: triṣulokeṣu dharmārthamannaṃ deyaṃ tato budhaiḥ // BhS_35.256 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9054: āyuśca vardhate tadvatteṣu lokeṣu niścitam // BhS_35.257 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9056: yacca meghagataṃ vāri śakro varṣati harṣitaḥ // BhS_35.258 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9059: tadyathā meghato vāri patitaṃ bhavati kṣitau /
GR14bhrgus_u:9060: tadā vasumatī devī snigdhā bhavati bhāvitā // BhS_35.260 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9064: agniṣṭomau hi tacchrakraṃ sṛjataḥ puṣyataśca ha // BhS_35.262 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9066: eka eva smṛto rāśistato bhūtāni jaṅgire // BhS_35.263 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9070: bhavanāni prakāśante divi teṣāṃ mahātmanām // BhS_35.265 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9077: vāpyo vīthyaḥ sabhāḥ kūpādīrghi kāścaiva sarvaśaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9080: kṣīraṃ sravanti saritastathā caivānna parvatāḥ // BhS_35.270 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9084: haviḥpātrādi sauvarṇaṃ rājataṃ tāmrameva vā // BhS_35.272 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9090: dadyāttāmrāṇi kāṃsyāni sārokyaṃ padameti saḥ // BhS_35.275 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9093: śvetaṃ vitānaṃ raktaṃ vā kṛṣṇaṃ pītaṃ ca śyāmalam /
GR14bhrgus_u:9094: dukūlenātha paṭṭena tantunānyena vā kṛtam // BhS_35.277 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9096: sopadhānāṃ satalpāṃ ca khaṭvāṃ dadyācca yohareḥ // BhS_35.278 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9100: rājyakāmī tu rājā syātsārvabhaumo 'pi jāyate // BhS_35.280 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9102: cāmaraṃ hemadaṇḍaṃ ca vyajanaṃ ratnabhūṣitam // BhS_35.281 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9103: kevalaṃ hemadaṇḍaṃ vā bhaktyā śaktyā ca saṃyutam /
GR14bhrgus_u:9108: aśakyaṃ tatphalaṃ vaktuṃ sarvairapi surāsuraiḥ // BhS_35.284 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9109: sauvarmaṃ viṣṇurūpantu yo bhaktyaiva tu kārayet /
GR14bhrgus_u:9114: haimaṃ siṃhāsanaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ yo bhaktyaivār'payeddhareḥ // BhS_35.287 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9117: haimaṃ yānaṃ tathāruhya viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati /
GR14bhrgus_u:9119: siṃhāsanaṃ vā yo dadyātsomalokaṃ sa gacchati /
GR14bhrgus_u:9121: hṛdyavāksusvaro hṛdyo vāgmī sa tu bhavennaraḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9127: yadyaddravyaṃ mudā yukto dadyāttu haraye naraḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9128: tadagre pūjakebhyaśca gurave ca viśeṣataḥ // BhS_35.294 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9132: yadyatkarma tadarthaṃ syātparicaryā ca tasya yā // BhS_35.296 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9133: tasyopacāraṃ yatkarma karoti śraddhayā tu yaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9134: sarvayajñaphalaṃ prāpya nāmīpyaṃ padamāpnu yāt // BhS_35.297 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9138: athār'cane phalaṃ vakṣye viśeṣeṇa madhudviṣaḥ // BhS_35.299 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9140: sāyaṃ prātaśca deveśaṃ namasyannatha cintayan // BhS_35.300 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9141: yaḥ pramāmaṃ muhuḥ kuryātsa tu yajñaphalaṃ labhet /
GR14bhrgus_u:9146: yaḥ kuryātpūjanaṃ viṣṇostatra devo vaseddhruvam // BhS_35.303 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9148: ābhirūpyācca biṃbasya sannidheḥ procyate hareḥ // BhS_35.304 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9149: āsanaṃ haraye datvā pratiṣṭhāṃ labhate ciram /
GR14bhrgus_u:9152: pādyamācamanīyaṃ ca samarpya haraye naraḥ // BhS_35.306 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9154: nityaṃ puṣpāṇi puṇyāni bhaktyā yastu samarcayet // BhS_35.307 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9158: tasyānantaphalaṃ prokta mananto bhagavān hariḥ // BhS_35.309 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9162: maṅgalaṃ tasya niśchidraṃ bhavedeva na saṃśayaḥ // BhS_35.311 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9164: sa cāna ntaphalaṃ prāpya modate viṣṇusannedhau // BhS_35.312 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9167: bahujātisumānāṃ ca dānena prīyate sa vai /
GR14bhrgus_u:9170: tulasīṃ mūrthni devasya samarpya madhuvidviṣaḥ // BhS_35.315 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9172: sarvāṅgeṣvarpayan puṣpaṃ sarvagasya naro hareḥ // BhS_35.316 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9180: sarveṣāmapi puṣpāṇāṃ tulasī prītidā hareḥ // BhS_35.320 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9182: anugacchati taṃ devo yathā gorvatsalā bhṛśam // BhS_35.321 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9188: ye kurvanti hareḥ pūjāṃ te kṛtārthāḥ kalau yuge // BhS_35.324 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9189: śuṣkaṃ paryuṣitaṃ vār'draṃ kāṣṭhaṃ vā tulasīdalam /
GR14bhrgus_u:9192: varjyaṃ paryuṣitaṃ puṣpaṃ na varjyaṃ tulasīdalam // BhS_35.326 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9193: varjyaṃ paryuṣitaṃ toyaṃ na varjyaṃ jāhnavījalam /
GR14bhrgus_u:9194: anyatparyuṣitaṃ varjyaṃ na varjyaṃ padmapuṣpakam // BhS_35.327 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9198: devā divisthitā ye vaitiṣṭhanti tulasīdale // BhS_35.329 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9200: yāvanna prāpyate puṇyā tulasī viṣṇuvallabhā // BhS_35.330 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9204: nārcayeddūrvayā durgāṃ na tulasyā surāntaram // BhS_35.332 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9208: harerabhyarcanāyāṃ ca tulasī sādhanaṃ param // BhS_35.334 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9212: tathā tuṣyati govindo yathaina tulasīdalaiḥ // BhS_35.336 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9214: tulasyaiva hareḥ pūjāṃ ye kurvanti sadā bhuvi // BhS_35.337 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9215: tasmāttulasyā sadṛśaṃ sa ca bhūtaṃ na bhāvi ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:9222: tulasīkānanaṃ yatra yatra vā harikīrtanam // BhS_35.341 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9227: sūryalokaṃ sa gatvaiva yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam /
GR14bhrgus_u:9228: ghṛtena kāpilenaiva dṛḍhavartiyutaṃ tu yaḥ // BhS_35.344 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9230: so 'ndhaṃ naiva praviśati narakaṃ narapuṅgavaḥ // BhS_35.345 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9234: tasya pāpāni naśyanti nirlepassa bhaviṣyati // BhS_35.347 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9236: candralokaṃ sa gatvaiva yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam // BhS_35.348 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9237: sugandhi śubhamutpūtaṃ snānatoyaṃ ca yo dadet /
GR14bhrgus_u:9239: tataśca vāruṇaṃ lokaṃ prāpya tatraiva modate /
GR14bhrgus_u:9242: kārpāsamatha ca kṣaumaṃ kauśeyaṃ rāṅkavaṃ tathā // BhS_35.351 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9248: jāṃbūnadaṃ śātakuṃbhaṃ hāṭakaṃ vaiṇavaṃ tathā // BhS_35.354 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9249: śruṅgī ca śuktijaṃ caiva jātarūpamataḥ param /
GR14bhrgus_u:9254: rājaśriyaṃ ca bhuktvā nte viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati // BhS_35.357 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9264: tasya prasannau jāyete daṃpatī jagataḥ patī // BhS_35.362 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9265: mātrāṃ ca devadesya datvā haste viśeṣataḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9274: kṛsaraṃ vinivedyaiva devasya mudito naraḥ // BhS_35.367 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9276: gaulyaṃ nivedya devasya prāpnoti guḍaparvatān // BhS_35.368 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9278: yavodanasya donena nīrogo bhavati dhruvam // BhS_35.369 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9282: sugandhi svādu śuddhaṃ ca pānīyaṃ yo harerdadet // BhS_35.371 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9284: kadalyā nārikelasya cūtasya panasasya ca // BhS_35.372 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9285: phalāni ca nupakvāni bhaktyā śuddhāni yo dadet /
GR14bhrgus_u:9289: tāṃbūlaṃ kramukairyuktaṃ mukhavāsaṃ ca yo dadet /
GR14bhrgus_u:9292: balaṃ balavatāṃ labdhvā viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati // BhS_35.376 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9293: baliṃ seveta yo bhaktyā so 'pi yajñaphalaṃ labhet /
GR14bhrgus_u:9296: viṣṇoḥ kathāstu saṃkīrtyastotraiḥ stutvā ca vaiṣṇavaiḥ // BhS_35.378 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9302: sakāmānāṃ phalaṃ kāmyamakāmānāṃ paraṃ padam // BhS_35.381 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9304: utsāha utsavaḥ prokto manuṣyāṇāṃ viśeṣetaḥ // BhS_35.382 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9308: utsavaṃ devadevasya yaḥ kuryātsvakulaṃ svakam // BhS_35.384 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9309: uttārayan svayaṃ viṣṇossa yāti paramaṃ padam /
GR14bhrgus_u:9311: sa yajño vo narān yuṣmānuttārayati niścayam /
GR14bhrgus_u:9312: iti vedā vadantīti sa utsava udīrya te // BhS_35.386 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9314: yaścotsavena yajate tayostulyaṃ phalaṃ nmṛtam // BhS_35.387 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9316: devasyāśnuvate sarvaṃ ye yajante saṃśayaḥ // BhS_35.388 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9319: karmāṇā manasā vācā te 'pi yānti phalaṃ bahu /
GR14bhrgus_u:9320: grāme vā ragare va'pi pattane vā mahotsavaḥ // BhS_35.390 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9322: yatra deśe janapade rāṣṭre vā pyutsavo hareḥ // BhS_35.391 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9334: ālepanaṃ mārjanaṃ ca rajaḥ praśamanaṃ tathā // BhS_35.397 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9337: yānaṃ vahanti ye viprāste yānti brahmaṇaḥ padam /
GR14bhrgus_u:9338: rathaṃ vahanti ye cāśvāste 'pi yāntisurālayam // BhS_35.399 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9342: ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni ye tatrādhīyate janāḥ // BhS_35.401 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9343: te pare vyomni devasya pārśve vartanti nisspṛhāḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9351: taddravyaṃ varthate tasya naśyaṃ tyevāśubhāni tu /
GR14bhrgus_u:9352: rājño rāṣṭrasya taddravyaṃ samṛddhyaiva bhaviṣyati // BhS_35.406 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9354: nirmāti yaḥprapāṃ viṣṇordevasya nnapanāya vai // BhS_35.407 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9384: yastu kuryājjaladroṇīṃ snānapīṭhaṃ ca śārṅgiṇaḥ // BhS_35.422 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9385: sa sarvaiḥ pūjyayānantu pīṭhe cātyunna te vaset /
GR14bhrgus_u:9386: evaṃ yassnapanaṃ viṣṇoḥ kārayecchaktito naraḥ // BhS_35.423 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9388: ante vimāsamāruhya haimaṃ devaiḥ parīvṛtaḥ // BhS_35.424 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9392: devadevasya viṣṇostu snapanaṃ bhaktimāṃstu yaḥ // BhS_35.426 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9393: seveta so 'pi pāpmabhyo mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9396: utsavaṃ sevateyastu so 'pi yajñaphalaṃ labhet // BhS_35.428 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9400: anyeṣvapi ca puṇyeṣu kāryeṣu jagataḥ prabhum // BhS_35.430 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9403: khaṇḍite sphaṭite dhāmni dūṣite ca sūdhādibhiḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9404: samādadhyātpunardhāma sa lokaṃ yāti vaiṣṇavaṃ // BhS_35.432 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9406: sthāpayedbhakti yuktaśca sa yāti paramāṃ gatim // BhS_35.433 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9408: yaḥ sandhāya punaḥ kuryātpritiṣṭhāṃ pūrvavanmudā // BhS_35.434 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9410: śīrṇe jīrṇe tathā bhinne bhūṣaṇādau viśeṣataḥ // BhS_35.435 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9414: tasya kāyakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ tatkṣaṇādeva naśyati // BhS_35.437 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9418: yo dadyāducitāṃ vṛttiṃ sa yamaṃ nopasarpati // BhS_35.439 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9424: tasya vāso bhavetsvarge cāvadidrāśca turdhaśa // BhS_35.442 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9426: tasya tuṣyati deveśassa tu svārājyamaśnu te // BhS_35.443 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9428: dṛṣṭvā ca śraddhayā yuktoyo devamupatiṣṭhate // BhS_35.444 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9434: prāyaścittavidhānaṃ tu provāca jagatāṃ hitaḥ // BhS_35.447 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9441: tasya puṇyaphalaṃ vaktuṃ na śakyaṃ tridaśairapi /
GR14bhrgus_u:9442: iha loke 'khilān kāmānanubhūya sukhaṃ cirāt // BhS_35.451 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9452: atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa kriyālope ca yatphalam // BhS_35.456 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9459: svayaṃ nivartate yastu tasya syānmahatī vipat /
GR14bhrgus_u:9460: saṃkalpya devatāgāraṃ nirmātuṃ yo viśeṣataḥ // BhS_35.460 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9462: ācāryassatataṃ goptā ācāryastu pitā smṛtaḥ // BhS_35.461 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9464: ārabhya gehanirmāṇaṃ devasya jagataḥ pateḥ // BhS_35.462 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9465: asamāpya tu yo mūḍho nivarte pravilobhataḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9466: tasya saṃpadvināśassyāt kruddho bhavati cāvyayaḥ // BhS_35.463 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9468: yaḥ kuryādantarāyaṃ tu tasya puṇyaṃ vinaśyati // BhS_35.464 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9469: yena vighnastadā bhūyāttaṃ hatvāpi na doṣabhāk /
GR14bhrgus_u:9470: yastu śāstroditaṃ karma kurvantaṃ ca padārthinam // BhS_35.465 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9474: adhvare vartamāne tu saṃbhārān śāstracoditān // BhS_35.467 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9475: yo na dadyātsa pāpīyān nāpnuyāt karmajaṃ phalam /
GR14bhrgus_u:9476: pratiṣṭhāpya harerbiṃbaṃ yo na satkurute gurum // BhS_35.468 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9478: pratiṣṭhānte tathā nityamavicchinnaṃ tu pūjitum // BhS_35.469 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9482: sa bhavedbrahmahā caiva dhanaṃ tasya vilupyati // BhS_35.471 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9486: anyaṃ vā yojayettatra tāvubhau vinaśiṣyataḥ // BhS_35.473 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9490: sarve ca kramaśaḥ pūjāṃ kartumarhanti te yataḥ // BhS_35.475 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9491: pitryaṃ bhavati devasya dāyādyaṃ pūjanaṃ svataḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9494: yastudadyādarcakāya bhṛtyarthaṃ ke valaṃ dhanam // BhS_35.477 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9502: nirmāti brāhmaṇaṃ bhūyo yajamānastu devalam // BhS_35.481 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9510: svadattāṃ varadattāṃ vā yo hareta vasundharām // BhS_35.485 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9516: pañca kanyānṛte hanti daśa hanti gavānṛte // BhS_35.488 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9519: sarvaṃ bhūmyanṛte hanti no brūyādanṛtaṃ kvacit /
GR14bhrgus_u:9524: brahmasvaṃ brahmahatyā ca daridrasya ca yaddhanam // BhS_35.492 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9526: brahmasve no matiṃ kuryātprāṇaiḥ kaṇṭhagatairapi // BhS_35.493 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9532: lohacūrṇāṃśca cūrṇāṃśca viṣaṃ vā jarayetpumān // BhS_35.496 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9534: devasvaṃ brāhmaṇasvaṃ ca lobheno pahinasti yaḥ // BhS_35.497 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9540: daśavājisamā kanyā bhūmidānena sā samā // BhS_35.500 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9542: ācchettācānumantā ca tānyena narake vaset // BhS_35.501 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9544: brāhmaṇānāṃ hṛte kṣetre hanyādāsaptamaṃ kulam // BhS_35.502 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9546: dadaddhi bhūmiṃ sādhubhyo vindate phūmimuttamām // BhS_35.503 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9550: tadarcakārpitāṃ bhūmiṃ yo hareta yateta vā // BhS_35.505 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9551: kiṃ punastasya vaktavyaṃ na bhavettasya niṣkṛtiḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9552: na vācā śakyate vaktuṃ gatistasya durātmanaḥ // BhS_35.506 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9553: mriyeta sadya evāsau jāyate 'tha punaḥ punaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9554: na tasya śaraṇaṃ kvāpi labhyate pāpakarmaṇaḥ // BhS_35.507 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9558: vasanti bhūyo jāyante nīcayoniṣu ca dhruvam // BhS_35.509 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9560: gale nigalitaḥ pāśaiḥ kṛṣyate nirayeṣu saḥ // BhS_35.510 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9568: uṣitvā narakeṣvete jāyante phaṇināṃ kule // BhS_35.514 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9578: kṛtinaḥ pretya narake pacyante duḥkhabhāginaḥ // BhS_35.519 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9580: upacārādihāno tu pāpasyedaṃ phalaṃ bhavet // BhS_35.520 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9588: snānadravyavihīne ca snānahīne tathaiva ca // BhS_35.524 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9592: agnidāhabhayaṃ caiva mandāgnitvaṃ ca jāyate // BhS_35.526 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9604: anyārāmodbhavaṃ puṣpaṃ nār'payediti ke cana // BhS_35.532 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9605: ārahare ca śukre ca manvādiṣu yugādiṣu /
GR14bhrgus_u:9608: tulasīṃ ye vicinvanti te kṛntanti hareśśiraḥ // BhS_35.534 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9612: bhugnapatraṃ na ca grāhyaṃ kṛmiduṣṭaṃ ca nāharet // BhS_35.536 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9614: sthalajaṃ noddharetpuṣpaṃ chedayejjalajaṃ na tu // BhS_35.537 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9619: snānaṃ kṛtvā tu ye ke citpuṣpaṃ gṛhṇanti vaidvijāḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9622: snānaṃ kṛtvātu madhyāhne puṣpāṇi na samāharet // BhS_35.541 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9625: sa tu tenaiva pāpena maṇḍūko jāyate naraḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9628: sa pūti gandhasaṃyuktaḥ kuṣṭhī caiva prajāyate // BhS_35.544 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9629: janmadvayaṃ tu vai mūḍhaśśūdratāṃ yāti mānavaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9635: arghyahīne tu devasya kulaṃ bhavati ninditam /
GR14bhrgus_u:9640: havirnivedane hīne durbhikṣaṃ bhavati dhruvam // BhS_35.550 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9642: nālikeraphale hīne hīne kṣīrādike tathā // BhS_35.551 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9644: hīne bhakṣyādike caiva vividhe haviṣī prabho // BhS_35.552 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9650: śāntasya pūjane hīne tathā caivānapāyinām // BhS_35.555 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9657: bhūtapīṭhasya pārśve vā dakṣiṇe vā viśeṣataḥ, /
GR14bhrgus_u:9660: śrīdevyā arcane hīne saṃpadāṃ tu bhavet kṣayaḥ // BhS_35.560 //

GR14bhrgus_u:10396: loṣṭhamardī tṛṇacchedī nakhakhādī ca yo naraḥ // BhS_36.321 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10406: janmadvayantu vai mūḍhāśśūdratāṃ yānti te narāḥ // BhS_36.326 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10408: sa pūtigandhasaṃyuktaḥ kuṣṭhī caiva bhaveddhruvam // BhS_36.327 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10410: jātakaṃ mṛtakaṃ vāpi yasyāśaucaṃ vidhīyate // BhS_36.328 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10419: upanīto vasenmā vā tathā gurukule kramāt /
GR14bhrgus_u:10430: yastu devagṛhadvāre prasārya caraṇau kvacit // BhS_36.338 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10437: tatassūkaratāṃ prāpya janmāni nava pañca ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:10438: kliśyate bahubhiḥ kaṣṭairna śayīta harergṛhe // BhS_36.342 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10440: devālaye viśeṣeṇa prākāre vāpi mūḍhadhīḥ // BhS_36.343 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10442: sapta pañca ca janmāni tato mānuṣatāṃ vrajet // BhS_36.344 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10444: sa bhaveddurmanā dīno pretya ceha ca janmani // BhS_36.345 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10448: āsanāni tvasaṃkhyāni devāgāre na cācaret // BhS_36.347 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10452: savyaṃ khūlaṃ sukhaṃ caiva gomukhaṃ garuḍaṃ tathā // BhS_36.349 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10454: kuñjaraṃ kukkuṭaṃ nāgaṃ kāṣṭhaṃ kraiñcaṃ ca kūrmakam // BhS_36.350 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10456: yonyāsanaṃ vāsakaṃ ca dhīraṃ padmāsanaṃ tathā // BhS_36.351 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10458: tripadaṃ hastikarṇaṃ ca hemamardhāsanaṃ tathā // BhS_36.352 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10460: anyāni śāstrasiddhāni yāni santi viśeṣataḥ // BhS_36.353 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10462: bhuñjīyāddevatāgāre yaḥ pāpassa tu durmanāḥ // BhS_36.354 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10463: kukṣirogārdito bhūtvā janmāni daśa pañca ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:10466: devāgāre viśeṣeṇa sa bhavennindito janaḥ // BhS_36.356 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10470: āpośanaṃ tu kṛtvaiva yadadyādbhojanaṃ tutat // BhS_36.358 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10474: sa gacchennarakān krūrān yāvanta udabindavaḥ // BhS_36.360 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10476: niveditaṃ tu devasya devasyāgre viśeṣataḥ // BhS_36.361 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10485: niveditaṃ tu devasya saṃtuṣṭyaisvasya tasya ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:10486: tasya tuṣyati deveśa ādātā tu vipadyate // BhS_36.366 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10490: na jātu pāvayennaiva pāvayetpāvayenna tu // BhS_36.368 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10493: tena bhuktaṃ bhavetpāpaṃ dātureva na saṃśayaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10498: pretya sṛgālatāṃ yānti nava janmāni pañca ca // BhS_36.372 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10500: caṇḍālo jāyate pretya kṣudhitaśca carenmuhuḥ // BhS_36.373 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10501: vikrīṇate tu ye viprā vāṇijye dattacakṣuṣaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10505: kaṇamannasya vāna syāttapyante tatra te janāḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10506: ye gṛhītvā tadannādi bhuñjate kṣudhitā janāḥ // BhS_36.376 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10508: annaṃ prāṇā manuṣyāṇāṃ sarvamanne pratiṣṭhitam // BhS_36.377 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10510: annaṃ vikrīṇate ye tu prāṇavikrayiṇaḥ smṛtāḥ // BhS_36.378 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10516: sa nidhiṃ puratassiddhaṃ tyaktvā bhikṣati kākiṇīm // BhS_36.381 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10520: sā hānistanmamahacchidraṃ sā bhrāntissā tu vikriyā // BhS_36.383 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10524: magneneva mahāsiṃdhau hateneva ca vātyayā // BhS_36.385 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10528: tasmāddevagṛhaṃ gatvā naro nānyaparo bhavet // BhS_36.387 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10530: sa sarvo 'pi mudhā proktomithyetyeke vadantitam // BhS_36.388 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10531: na hi devasya purataḥ kvacidapyanṛtaṃ vadet /
GR14bhrgus_u:10532: satyasvarūpī bhagavān satyaṃ tasmaina gūhayet // BhS_36.389 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10533: satyameva paraṃ brahma satyameva paraṃ tapaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10534: satyameva paro yajñassatyameva paraṃ śrutam // BhS_36.390 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10535: satyaṃ deveṣu jāgarti satyaṃ dharmataroḥ phalam /
GR14bhrgus_u:10537: ādyo vidhiśca vidyā ca sarvaṃ satye pratiṣṭhitam /
GR14bhrgus_u:10538: satyaṃ yajñantathā vedāssatyā devī sarasvatī // BhS_36.392 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10544: satyaṃ tu vadato loke tulitaṃ syānna saṃśayaḥ // BhS_36.395 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10545: aśvamedhasahasraṃ ca satyaṃ ca tulayā kṛtam /
GR14bhrgus_u:10548: satyamāhuḥparaṃ dharmaṃ satyamāhuḥ paraṃ padam // BhS_36.397 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10549: satyamāhuḥ paraṃ brahma tasmātsatyaṃ na lobhayet /
GR14bhrgus_u:10554: vaktavyaṃ ca sadā satyaṃ na satyādvidyate param // BhS_36.400 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10556: snātavyaṃ manasā yuktaistatsnānaṃ paramaṃ smṛtam // BhS_36.401 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10557: devārthe vā parārthe vā putrārthe vā ''tmane tathā /
GR14bhrgus_u:10558: ye 'nṛtaṃ nābhibhāṣante te svargaṃ yāntimānavāḥ // BhS_36.402 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10563: parīkṣante ca sarvāsu daśāsu puruṣaṃ sadā /
GR14bhrgus_u:10566: devāgāre viśeṣeṇa te praṇaśyanti sānvayam // BhS_36.406 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10570: te yānti narakaṃ pāpā jāyante nīcayoniṣu // BhS_36.408 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10572: tathānte krūrā nava janmāni pañca ca // BhS_36.409 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10574: te 'pi tittiritāṃ bhūtvā jāyante janmapañcakam // BhS_36.410 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10578: asārāṇi tu śāstrāṇi bhūyāṃsi pṛthivītale // BhS_36.412 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10580: teṣu śāstreṣu ye jātāśśāstrārthāśca viśeṣataḥ // BhS_36.413 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10582: citraśilpā na saṃdeho narastena na mucyate // BhS_36.414 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10583: sā vidyā yā hariṃ stauti sā kriyā yattadarcanam /
GR14bhrgus_u:10584: yā nyā yadanyadakhilaṃ duṣṭodarkā hi jīvikā // BhS_36.415 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10585: na hi devagṛhaṃ gatvā śāstrārthairnī rasairnaraḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10587: viśālaṃ vāṅmayaṃ sarvaṃ sṛṣṭvā sraṣṭā hariḥ prabhuḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10593: pāṭhanaṃ lekhanādyaṃ ca naiva kuryādgṛhe hareḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10596: yastu devagṛhaṃ gatvā roditi praṇayādyathā // BhS_36.421 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10597: duḥkhitaḥ stauti vā devaṃ tatsyānmānasikaṃ malam /
GR14bhrgus_u:10598: nirvāṇaparamaṃ sthānaṃ mlānena manasā tu yaḥ // BhS_36.422 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10599: sevate sa na jānāti tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam /
GR14bhrgus_u:10600: nārī vā puruṣo vāpi gatvā devagṛhaṃ kvacit // BhS_36.423 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10605: prāpya tit tiritāṃ kālaṃ vasiṣyanti ciraṃ bhuvi /
GR14bhrgus_u:10606: naivātra hiṃsāṃ kurvīta prāṇināṃ duḥkhadāṃ kvacit // BhS_36.426 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10611: kāmakrodhau ca saṃyamya tataḥ siddhimavāpnu te /
GR14bhrgus_u:10613: ātmanassukhamanvicchan sa pretya na sukhī bhavet /
GR14bhrgus_u:10614: ātmopamastu bhūteṣu yo vaibhavati pūruṣaḥ // BhS_36.430 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10620: prakhyāpane ca dāne ca sukhaduḥkhe priyāpriye // BhS_36.433 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10622: ṛṣayo brāhmaṇā devāḥ praśaṃsanti viśeṣataḥ // BhS_36.434 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10624: karmaṇā na naraḥ kurvan hiṃsāṃ jātu vicakṣaṇaḥ, // BhS_36.435 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10625: vācā ca manasā caiva tato duḥkhātpramucyate /
GR14bhrgus_u:10628: yathā sarvaścatuṣpādvai tribhiḥ pādairna tiṣṭhati // BhS_36.437 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10632: evaṃ lokeṣvahiṃsā tu nirdiṣṭādharmataḥ purā // BhS_36.439 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10634: yatsarveṣviha bhūteṣu dayāhiṃsātmikā tu yā // BhS_36.440 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10635: na bhayaṃ vidyate jātu narasyeha dayāvataḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10638: abhayaṃ sarvabhūtāni dadatīti jagau śrutiḥ // BhS_36.442 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10639: kṣataṃ ca patitaṃ caiva skhalitaṃ klinnamāhatam /
GR14bhrgus_u:10640: sarvabhūtāni rakṣanti sameṣu viṣameṣu ca // BhS_36.443 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10641: nainaṃ vyālamṛgā ghnanti na piśācā na rākṣasāḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10642: mucyate bhayakāleṣu mokṣayedyo bhaye parān // BhS_36.444 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10643: prāṇadānātparaṃ dānaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati /
GR14bhrgus_u:10644: na hyātmanaḥ priyakaraṃ kiṃ cidastīha niścitam // BhS_36.445 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10646: mṛtyukāle hi bhūtānāṃ sadyo jāyeta vepathuḥ // BhS_36.446 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10652: hanyamānāśca dṛśyante vivaśā ghātukā narāḥ // BhS_36.449 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10654: ākramya māryamāṇāśca trāsyantyanye punaḥ punaḥ // BhS_36.450 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10660: ahiṃsā paramaṃ dānamahiṃsā paramaṃ tapaḥ // BhS_36.453 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10662: ahiṃsā paramaṃ mitramahiṃsā paramaṃ sukham // BhS_36.454 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10663: sarvayajñeṣu vā dānaṃ sarvatīrtheṣu vā plutam /
GR14bhrgus_u:10666: ahiṃsrassarvabhūtānāṃ yathā mātā yathā pitā // BhS_36.456 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10670: dhānyānyapi na hiṃseta yassa bhūyādahiṃsakaḥ // BhS_36.458 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10673: tapyamāne śarīre tu śarīre cendriyāṇi tu /
GR14bhrgus_u:10674: tiṣṭhanti svavaśe tasya nṛpāṇāmiva kiṅkarāḥ // BhS_36.460 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10676: indriyāṇāṃ nirodhena dānena ca damena ca // BhS_36.461 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10685: pītvā ca bhakṣayitvā ca upavāsavrataṃ caret // BhS_36.466 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10687: na prāśnīyādvimūḍhātmā rauravaṃ narakaṃ vrajet // BhS_36.467 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10688: na hi devagṛhaṃ gatvā vivadeta naraḥ kvacit /
GR14bhrgus_u:10689: na tat sthānaṃ vivādasya tasmāttaṃ dūrata styajet // BhS_36.468 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10690: mano 'navasthitaṃ yasya sa nālaṃ pūjitaṃ harim /
GR14bhrgus_u:10691: yasyaiva nirmalaṃ cittaṃ sor'hassarveṣu karmasu // BhS_36.469 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10695: na badhnāti padaṃ haṃsaḥ kadācitkardamāṃbhasi // BhS_36.471 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10696: na yogyā mādhavaṃ stotuṃ vāgduṣṭā cānṛtādinā /
GR14bhrgus_u:10703: aśikṣayaiva manasaḥ prāyo lokaśca vañcyate // BhS_36.475 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10707: kruddhaḥ pāpaṃ na kuryātkaḥ kruddho hanyādgurūnapi // BhS_36.477 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10711: vācyāvācyaṃ prakupito na vicānāti karhi cit // BhS_36.479 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10713: yassamutpatitaṃ krodhaṃ kṣamayā tu nirasyati // BhS_36.480 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10714: yathoragastvacaṃ jīrṇāṃ sa vai puruṣa ucyate /
GR14bhrgus_u:10717: parāpavādaṃ na brūyānnāpriyaṃ ca kadā cana // BhS_36.482 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10721: sa eva bhagavān devassarvajñaḥ sarvaśaktiyuk // BhS_36.484 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10724: iti saṃcintya bhūyo 'pi sarveṣvapi ca jantuṣu /
GR14bhrgus_u:10729: sa yāti narakaṃ ghoraṃ na daivaṃ tasya mṛṣyati // BhS_36.488 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10731: devatāmandiraṃ prāpya kāleṣvanyeṣu vā tathā // BhS_36.489 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10735: maryādāsu sa tiṣṭhanti sa doṣaḥ strīṣu garhitaḥ // BhS_36.491 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10737: striyo hi mūlaṃ doṣāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ // BhS_36.492 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10741: pāpīyaso narān yadvai tyaktalajjā bhajantitāḥ // BhS_36.494 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10742: strīyaṃ hi yaḥ prārthayate sannikarṣaṃ ca gacchatir /
GR14bhrgus_u:10743: iṣacca kurute sevāṃ tamevecchanti yoṣitaḥ // BhS_36.495 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10747: rūpavantaṃ virūpaṃ vā pumānityeva bhuñjate // BhS_36.497 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10754: paṅguṣvanyeṣu kuṣṭheṣu ye cānye kutsitā narāḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10757: apyanyonyaṃ pravartantena hi tiṣṭhanti bhartṛṣu // BhS_36.502 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10761: vadhabandhabhayāccāpi svayaṃ guptā bhavanti tāḥ // BhS_36.504 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10763: prājasya puruṣasyeva yathā bhāvās tathā strīyaḥ // BhS_36.505 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10767: dṛṣṭvaiva puruṣaṃ hyanyaṃ yoniḥ praklidyate striyāḥ // BhS_36.507 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10769: rakṣitāraṃ na mṛṣyanti svabhartāramasat striyaḥ // BhS_36.508 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10773: kṣuradhārā viṣaḥ sarpo vahnirityekataḥ striyaḥ // BhS_36.510 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10775: na cāsāṃ mucyate kaścitpuruṣo hastamāgataḥ // BhS_36.511 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10777: śaṃbarasya ca yā māyā yā māyā namucerapi // BhS_36.512 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10779: hasantaṃ prahasantyetā rudantaṃ prarudanti ca // BhS_36.513 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10781: yadi jihmā sahasraṃ syājjīvecca śaradāṃ śatam // BhS_36.514 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10783: uśanā veda yacchāstraṃ yacca veda bṛhaspatiḥ // BhS_36.515 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10784: strībuddhyā na viśiṣyeta surakṣyā na bhavantitāḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10786: iti yāstāḥ kathaṃ rakṣyāḥ puruṣairdurbharāḥ striyaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10788: apāstāśca tathā sadyo vikurvanti manaḥ striyaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10789: na ca strīṇāṃ kriyāḥ kāściditi dharmo vyavasthitaḥ // BhS_36.518 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10792: durvāgarbhavaṃ ratiṃ caiva dadau strībhyaḥ prajāpatiḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10793: na tāsāṃ rakṣaṇaṃ śakyaṃ kartuṃ puṃsāṃ kathaṃ cana // BhS_36.520 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10795: vācā ca vadhabandhairvā kleśairvā vividhaistathā // BhS_36.521 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10796: na śakyā rakṣitāṃ nāryastā hi nityamasaṃyatāḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10799: nātaḥ paraṃ hi nārīṇāṃ vidyate ca kadā cana // BhS_36.523 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10802: na ca dahyanti gacchantyaḥ sutaptairapi pāṃsubhiḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10803: nānilo 'gnirna varuṇo na cānye tridaśāntathā // BhS_36.525 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10804: priyāḥ strīṇāṃ yathā kāmo ratiśīlā hi yoṣitaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10805: sahasrekila nārīṇāṃ prāpyetaikā kadā cana // BhS_36.526 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10807: naitā jānanti pitaraṃ na kulaṃ na ca mātaram // BhS_36.527 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10808: na bhrātṝnna ca bhartāraṃ na ca putrān na devarān /
GR14bhrgus_u:10809: līlāyantyaḥ kulaṃ ghnanti kūlānīva saridvarāḥ // BhS_36.528 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10811: na te sukhāya mantavyāḥ svedajā iva bindavaḥ // BhS_36.529 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10815: tādṛśaṃ strīṣu vijñeyaṃ nādhikaṃ tāsu vidyate // BhS_36.531 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10817: tadvat strīṣvapi vijñeyaṃ na saukhyaṃ paramārthataḥ // BhS_36.532 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10819: tādṛśaṃ strīṣu vijñeyaṃ nādhikaṃ tāsu vidyate // BhS_36.533 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10821: tathā devotsavādīnāṃ sevā tāsāṃ niṣidhyate // BhS_36.534 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10822: na hi svatantrato yoṣijjātu gacchet sthalāntaram /
GR14bhrgus_u:10823: na hi nirmimate vṛddhā līlayā devamandirān // BhS_36.535 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10825: anugacchetpitā bhrātā bhartā putro 'tha vā yadi // BhS_36.536 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10833: tasmāt strīṣu na kartavyaḥ prasaṃgo devatākṛhe // BhS_36.540 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10836: na hīdṛśamanāyuṣyaṃ loke kiṃ cana vidyate /
GR14bhrgus_u:10839: yāvanto romakūpāḥ syuḥ strīṇāṃ gātreṣu nirmitāḥ // BhS_36.543 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10848: sa tu caṇḍālatāṃ prāpya jāyate janmanāṃ śatam /
GR14bhrgus_u:10856: iti devagṛhaṃ gantuṃ vyādhito naiva cārhati /
GR14bhrgus_u:10859: arcituṃ sevituṃ cāpi dātuṃ dravyacayaṃ tathā // BhS_36.553 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10862: janmāni nava pañcāpi jāyate malabhuk kṛmiḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10868: uṣṇīṣī na ca seveta naiva pāṇau dhṛtāyudhaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10871: śvitrī saṃjāyate mūḍho navajanmāni pañca ca // BhS_36.559 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10873: caṇḍālayonitāṃ yāti nava janmāni pañca ca // BhS_36.560 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10875: tvaṅkāro vā vadho veti vidvatsu na niśiṣyate // BhS_36.561 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10877: paranindā ca śāstrasya parasya tu vinindanam // BhS_36.562 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10879: nindayā vai pareṣāṃ tu ninditāste punassmṛtāḥ // BhS_36.563 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10881: tathā parastutiṃ caiva vidhinā saṃtyajennaraḥ // BhS_36.564 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10882: paraḥ parātmā puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ procyate tu yaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10883: tadagre 'nyasya devasya na stutiṃ stāvayennaraḥ // BhS_36.565 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10885: pūjayedyadi manyeta pūjārhaṃ vāsa naśyati // BhS_36.566 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10893: śaktau satyāṃ viśeṣeṇa yastulobhādinā naraḥ // BhS_36.570 //
